sentences.en: "This is Brady Coyne," said Sam, jerking his head in my direction.
sentences.cn: “这位是布雷迪·科因，”萨姆突然转头对我说。

sentences.en: "What kept you?" — "I went in the wrong direction."
sentences.cn: “你为什么晚了？”——“我走错了方向。”

sentences.en: A very helpful woman gave me directions to the police station.
sentences.cn: 一个很热心的妇女给我指了去警察局的路。

sentences.en: Adjust the aerial's position and direction for the best reception.
sentences.cn: 调整天线的位置和方向以达到最佳接收效果。

sentences.en: All work was produced by the students under the direction of John Williams.
sentences.cn: 所有作品都是在约翰·威廉斯的指导下由学生创作完成的。

sentences.en: An automatic weather station feeds information on wind direction to the computer.
sentences.cn: 自动化气象站将风向信息输入计算机。

sentences.en: As shots rang out, the crowd ran screaming in all directions .
sentences.cn: 枪声响起，人群尖叫着四散奔逃。

sentences.en: Be sure you read the directions before using any piece of equipment.
sentences.cn: 使用任何设备之前一定要先阅读操作指南。

sentences.en: He changed direction swiftly, turned into the hallway and headed her off.
sentences.cn: 他迅速改变方向，拐进走廊截住了她。

sentences.en: He had a poor sense of direction and soon got lost.
sentences.cn: 他方向感很差，一会儿就迷路了。

sentences.en: His failures underline the difference between theatre and film direction.
sentences.cn: 他的失败说明了导演戏剧和电影是不同的。

sentences.en: Molly razzed me about my rotten sense of direction.
sentences.cn: 莫利笑话我糟糕的方向感。

sentences.en: On seeing me, Maurice changed direction and went along the wharf instead.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯一看见我便改变方向，沿着码头走了。

sentences.en: She cast a wry glance in her grandmother's direction.
sentences.cn: 她朝奶奶无可奈何地瞟了一眼。

sentences.en: St Andrews was ten miles in the opposite direction.
sentences.cn: 圣安德鲁斯在相反方向上10英里处。

sentences.en: The country now had a sense of direction again.
sentences.cn: 现在该国又找到了方向。

sentences.en: The direction of the prevailing winds should be taken into account.
sentences.cn: 应该将盛行风的方向考虑在内。

sentences.en: The girls pointed in the opposite direction .
sentences.cn: 女孩子们指了相反的方向。

sentences.en: They set out in a westerly direction along the riverbank.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着河岸向西出发了。

sentences.en: They wandered off in the direction of the nearest store.
sentences.cn: 他们信步朝最近的商店走去。

sentences.en: Today, his change of direction seems more in tune with the times.
sentences.cn: 今天，他方向的改变似乎更与时代合拍。

sentences.en: Which direction did they go in ?
sentences.cn: 他们朝哪个方向走了？
